com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.http

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.http.RequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestHandlerBase, java.lang.Runnable

    public class RequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, RequestHandlerBase
    A class used to handle incoming requests. It checks if the current request being recieved is a GET request and sends the correct response back to the client.
